Indicate whether the Item Identifier is UOM Specific. This is a derived value from its associated universal item identifier type, and the provided value will be ignored in put item identifier type operation.

Flag to indicate Item Identifier Type is External.
Flag to indicate Item Identifier Type is inactive.
